title: "Interactive Squirrel Map"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(rsconnect)

squirrel_census = 
  read_csv("data/clean_squirrel_2018.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names()

```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
fur_vec = squirrel_census |> pull(primary_fur_color) |> unique ()
  
selectInput (
  inputId = "fur_choice",
  label = "Select Fur Color",
  choices = fur_vec
  )


activity_vec = 
  squirrel_census |>   
  mutate(activity = case_when(
      running == "TRUE" ~ "Running",
      chasing == "TRUE" ~ "Chasing",
      climbing == "TRUE" ~ "Climbing",
      foraging == "TRUE" ~ "Foraging",
      .default = "Sedentary"
    )
  ) |> 
  filter(activity != "Sedentary") |> 
  pull(activity) |> 
  unique ()

selectInput (
  inputId = "activity_choice",
  label = "Select Activity",
  choices = activity_vec
  )


shift_vec = squirrel_census |> pull(shift) |> unique()
  
selectInput (
  inputId = "shift_choice",
  label = "Select Time of Day",
  choices = shift_vec
  )


location_vec = squirrel_census |> pull(location) |> unique()
  
selectInput (
  inputId = "location_choice",
  label = "Select Location",
  choices = location_vec, 
  selected = "Ground Plane"
  )
```



Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  squirrel_fur_graph =
    squirrel_census |> 
    mutate(
      activity = case_when(
        running == "TRUE" ~ "Running",
        chasing == "TRUE" ~ "Chasing",
        climbing == "TRUE" ~ "Climbing",
        foraging == "TRUE" ~ "Foraging",
        .default = "Sedentary")
  ) |> 
    select(x, y, primary_fur_color, activity, shift, age, location) |> 
    filter(!is.na(primary_fur_color))
  
          
  squirrel_fur_graph |> 
    filter(primary_fur_color == input[["fur_choice"]]) |> 
    filter(activity == input[["activity_choice"]]) |> 
    filter(shift == input[["shift_choice"]]) |> 
    filter(location == input[["location_choice"]]) |> 
    plot_ly(lat = ~y,
    lon = ~x,
    color = ~age,
    colors = "Set2",
    marker = list(color = "Dark"),
    type = 'scattermapbox',
    mode   = 'markers', 
    alpha = 0.7) |> 
    layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = 'carto-positron',
      zoom = 12.75,
      center = list(lon = -73.96473, lat = 40.78396))) 
})


```
